358) Frank P. Bennett & Co., Inc. matters.

366) Frank B. Walker v. Van Kirkman.

373) Clock Cash Register Co. Ltd. agreememt with M. Gustine Rieser, ca. 1907.

378) [Small bundle with few documents, not identified by archivist].

380) M.S. Godfrey v. Toppan Manufacturing Company.
